plot: A jungle boy named Hare becomes a companion of a strange girl named Guu who apparently has a strange world inside of her stomach.
title: Janguru wa itsumo hare nochi Guu
plot_es: A jungle boy named Hare becomes a companion of a strange girl named Guu who apparently has a strange world inside of her stomach.
original_name: Janguru wa itsumo hare nochi Guu
plot_en: A jungle boy named Hare becomes a companion of a strange girl named Guu who apparently has a strange world inside of her stomach.
